feed.title: ./OpposingForce
feed.subtitle: Yelling into the void about offensive security things. Documenting my road to the OSCP, and hopefully sharing some helpful knowledge to other aspiring pentesters/red team operators.

entry.title: Automating haveibeenpwned Breach Searches with Powershell

link.title: Automating haveibeenpwned Breach Searches with Powershell

entry.summary: Introduction In an effort to automate as much as possible for my organization, I created two Powershell modules to help out our team with various tasks. This use case is the automation of checking haveibeenpwned (HIBP) daily and confirming if any of our enterprise users were found in a breach. The daemon scripts also creates a Trello card with breach info and affected users. tl;dr ...

entry.title: HTB Starting Point - Tier 0 - Redeemer
entry.summary: Introduction Reedemer is a new host on the Starting Point Tier 0 level. Some light reading of Redis will be needed for this exercise. tl;dr Spoiler! 1. Scan target. Redis is on TCP `6379`. 2. Reference HackTricks [Redis](https://book.hacktricks.xyz/network-servi...
